title: Customized Chinese Herbal Medicine - Palm Coast Acupuncture & Chiropractic
description: Unique plants and Chinese herbs combined in a manner to address your unique concerns.
cleaned_text: In Addition to Acupuncture or other modalities, Chinese Herbal Medicine may be utilized to help achieve optimal wellness. Chinese Herbal Medicine is a time-tested system of medicine that has been around for about 3,000 years. Chinese Herbal Medicine is used for anxiety, stress, bowel/digestive issues, insomnia, pain, menstrual issues, menopause, etc. It can be used internally or externally to help you get back to living your best life.
